name: Coordinated Effort
description: When two leaders form a partnership on a single action, their combined expertise ensures the best possible outcome

skills.description: if you want to go far, go together

criticalSuccess.description: Follow-up action gain +3 circumstance bonuses to their checks

success.description: The follow-up action gains a +2 circumstance bonus to its check

failure.description: The follow-up action gains a +1 circumstance bonus to its check

criticalFailure.description: The follow-up action gains a -2 circumstance penalty to its check

special: Meta-action that modifies other actions. Exactly TWO PCs may use this together once per turn.
